column1: Sister Diana! I hope we meet your expectations!\! And we have more than enough supplies to make it safely home.
column2: 戴安娜姐妹！希望我们不负您的期望！\!不仅如此，我们也有了足够的物资来安全回家。

column1: Of course, Abigayle. Thank you, Sister. You are to serve our new friend, \n[8], during our journey.
column2: 这是自然，阿比盖尔。谢谢你，姐妹。在旅途中，您要好好协助我们的新朋友\n[8]。

column1: So pleased to meet you, \n[8]! Yes, I am a priestess of the Sisterhood of Mercy.
column2: 很高兴认识你，\n[8]！是的，我是慈悲修女会的女祭司。

column1: ...You look so familiar. Do you have a brother?
column2: ……你看起来好眼熟啊。是不是有一个哥哥？

column1: Ha, yep. You're a mirror image of my friend, Jules. Only a sibling of his could be so... sunny.
column2: 哈，难怪。你跟我朋友朱尔斯简直是一个模子里刻出来的。只有他的亲兄妹才会这么……开朗阳光。

column1: !!!\| You know my brother?! Wow, how fortuitous!\! If you are a friend of my brother, you are surely a friend of mine, dear \n[8]. If... you will have me, of course...
column2: ！！！\|你认识我哥哥？！哇，这也太幸运了吧！\!如果你是我哥哥的朋友，那你肯定也是我的朋友啦，亲爱的\n[8]。当然……前提是……你愿意接受的话。
